main event: On 8 July 1961, multiple witnesses observed an unidentified flying object in Cleveland, Ohio, which was reported to hover and then accelerate away rapidly.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and circular, approximately 30-40 feet in diameter, changing color from red to white to blue,It hovered at an estimated altitude of 1,000 feet before rapidly accelerating and disappearing,The sighting lasted around 15 minutes with multiple witnesses confirming seeing the same object,The UFO emitted no sound during the observation,The incident has been classified as 'Unidentified' by the U.S. Air Force.
witness description: Three adult males, including a professor of physics and experienced pilots.
